title: Add CSC ID to site content

requirements.text: Add CSC ID "666236760012" to the centralized business content model and render it in the websiteâ€™s business information sections (at minimum: Contact page and site footer) using English labels.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/content/business.ts` includes a new `cscId` field with the value "666236760012".
The Site Footer shows a clearly labeled line "CSC ID: 666236760012" in the Contact Info area.
The Contact page shows a clearly labeled line "CSC ID: 666236760012" within the contact information cards/section.
No existing business identity fields (name/owner/phone/address/WhatsApp) are removed or altered.

constraints: Frontend files under `frontend/src/components/ui` must not be edited; only compose them.
Do not edit any paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No backend changes or persistence are required for adding the CSC ID.
No changes to Internet Identity/authentication or contact-form submission behavior.
